mapper.select: SELECT acct_balance, acct_dealdate, tr_ammount, tr ,tr_detail,tr_target FROM account WHERE mem_id=#{mem_id} AND hidden='no'
SELECT acct_balance FROM account d, (SELECT mem_id, MAX(r_num) r_num FROM account GROUP BY mem_id) c WHERE d.mem_id = #{mem_id} AND d.mem_id = c.mem_id AND d.r_num = c.r_num
SELECT acct_balance FROM account WHERE mem_id =#{mem_id} AND r_num=(SELECT max(r_num) FROM account)
